org.jgentleframework.configure
Interface CoreBinding

All Known Subinterfaces:
BindingConfig, Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractBindingConfig, AbstractConfig, Binder, BindingConfigImpl, RmiService, WebAbstractConfig
public interface CoreBinding

Provides some methods in order to configure binding and mapping.

Author:
Quoc Chung - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
BindingConfig

Method Detail

annotatedWith

MatcherPointcut<Definition,? extends Matching> annotatedWith(int location,
                                                             AND_OR andor,
                                                             java.lang.Class<?>... classes)
Creates a MatcherPointcut

Parameters:
location - the location is specified Location
andor - if equals AND_OR.AND, the returned value of Matcher.matches(Object) of matcher is only true when all annotations are annotated, otherwise, if equals AND_OR.OR, the returned value of Matcher.matches(Object) of matcher will be true as long as there is at least one annotation is annotated.
classes - the list of object class of annotations

annotatedWith

MatcherPointcut<Definition,? extends Matching> annotatedWith(int location,
                                                             java.lang.Class<?> clazz)
Creates a MatcherPointcut.

This method performance is the same as annotatedWith(int, AND_OR, Class...) according to AND_OR argument is AND_OR.AND

Parameters:
location - the location is specified Location
clazz - the object class of Annotation

               MatcherPointcut<?,? extends Matching> matcherPointcut)
Creates a binding to an Interceptor.

Parameters:
interceptor - the given interceptor.
matcherPointcut - a MatcherPointcut of given Interceptor

mappingBean

void mappingBean(java.lang.Class<?>... clazz)
Creates a mapping bean to a given type or a set of types. These classes should be annotated with Bean annotation in order to provides some additional information to Provider to instantiate bean. If be not annotated with Bean, these info will be default.

Parameters:
clazz - a given type or set of types
See Also:
Bean
